name: Aster.IO
description:
Fly through an endless asteroid field. Shoot at the floating rocks to break them down into smaller pieces. Use your tractor beam to scoop the valuable ore hidden inside the asteroids. And then look for the portal to jump to a new random level!

  • Levels are randomly generated based on the chosen difficulty
  • Asteroids respond to physics when they collide or are shot
  • The ship can move with 6 degrees of freedom and is subject to inertia

Developed by Alfredo Muñiz: www.linkedin.com/in/almulo

Music by Sara López: https://soundcloud.com/saralopezproductions
